description:
Shirley was a native from the island where http://anidb.net/ch44389 [Emiya Kiritsugu] lived with his father, http://anidb.net/ch38668 [Emiya Noritaka]. She ran odd jobs for Noritaka and also took up a post as his assistant in research. She also took care of Kiritsugu like a little brother.
Once she attempted to prove Noritaka`s research, but it ended up in spectacular failure, with her becoming a Dead Apostle and being subsequently killed, the http://anidb.net/ch1952 [Holy Church] and the http://anidb.net/ch1951 [Mage`s Association] intervening, almost everyone being killed, the entire village being burned down, Noritaka being murdered, and Kiritsugu fleeing with hunter http://anidb.net/ch38669 [Natalia Kaminska].
name: Shirley
